Articles.Content:
When I said "bit", that was not a typo, I actually meant that you get a bite taken out of you by a walker which gives you the deadly zombie disease, which reanimates you as a zombie after you die from it.

I use Cylon resurrection technology to download into a new body.

I stab the next poster.

... with the handle of a sword.

I eat the next poster.

I blow you up from the inside with C4

next poster is in range of the blast

I was going away from the blast source at the time, so I am out of range by the time it hits you.

The next poster isn't so lucky.

Still got my Katarn Mk 3 armor on. I could be on top of it and live

I stab the next poster in the neck.

That was actually my evil twin that you killed.

The next poster is dropped from the moon.

Since I was dropped from the moon I just float around in space with my specially Modified Katarn Mk3 armor with highly compressed oxygen tanks on the back.

I then fire the galaxy gun at the next poster.

i doge it

the next poster is blown up by a tank.

It's O.K. I'm data in a computer, and thankfully I was backed up on a flash drive.

The next person is assigned for the next launch of a one way Pluto mission.

I run away.

The next poster is thrown out into space without a space suit.

yes, but you forgot to take my armour.

next poster falls into molten beskar

I had Old Man Willaker's Healing Ale, and drank my 'juice' while swimming to safety.

Next poster is not as fortunate as I.

I activate my VTOL engines on my prototype XA-35 and fly off

next poster has do deal with AGM-69 SRAM tactical Nuke that's coming for you

Who's "you"?

The next poster has to deal the AGM-69 SRAM tactical nuke launched a post earlier.

*EMP*

next poster has to deal with a zombie apocalypse.

*Flys to Enceladus.*

Next poster has to deal with a zombie apocalypse from a post earlier.
DC-17 and Mk 3 kartan amour

You did not attack me.

Next person has a nuke headed at their face, that is already on course. At 2 km/s, while being extremely aerodynamic.

It is inaccurate, however, and shot over me. Then it hits the Moon .

The next user is in the area in which the nuke impacted.

I watch on the moon as the missile runs out of fuel before escaping the earths atmosphere.

Next poster has to deal with a nuke out of gas.

I fly next to it in a Tu-95 with a fuel tank mounted on top of it and I refuel the nuke with that. After it's refueled, I jettison the tank.

Next user is about to be hit with the fuel tank I just used.

I shoot it from orbit.

next poster dies of old age anticipating me attacking them.

You can't die of old age when you are still young!

The next poster dies anticipating the previous poster attacking him/her.

I never expected them to attack.

The next poster did.

What attack?

The next user have to face off against 50 Asian Elephants, 50 Bengal Tigers, 500 bears, and 5000 birds, all attacking the poster.
